title: Twitter Uncovers Atlanta Falcons RB’s Tevin Coleman’s Past NSFW Sexual Tweets And They’re Pretty Nasty
text:
In the middle of today’s Falcons-Seawhawks playoff game, certain Internet sleuth’s uncovered Falcons running back Tevin Coleman’s old NSFW tweet from 2012 and they’re quite something. 
Bringin home the Bacon I'm fucking ms. Piggy
— Tevin Coleman (@Teco_Raww) January 8, 2012 
#shittyestfeeling wen u fucking and a fart slips out
— Tevin Coleman (@Teco_Raww) August 23, 2011 


#Niggazdontnohowtoact wen they see shit stains n they drawls like wen that happen
— Tevin Coleman (@Teco_Raww) January 6, 2012 
#LinesDatLeadToSex my dick big
— Tevin Coleman (@Teco_Raww) August 23, 2011 


Why do a nigga always have the urge to smell their fingers every time they scratch their balls or ass
— Tevin Coleman (@Teco_Raww) November 27, 2011 
#sexisbetter wen her pussy don't stank
— Tevin Coleman (@Teco_Raww) August 24, 2011 


#Oomf need to stop wearing dem damn leggings erday wit ha nasty ass
